p: Natural products may provide lead compounds, especially as antimicrobial agents (Dias et al., 2012; Hu et al., 2015; Newman & Cragg, 2016). A large range of marine products displays chemical structures with good biological activities to discover drug like for various human diseases caused by virus, including COVID-19. An additional advantage of marine products, as most of them has the property of drug-likeness with high degrees of bioavailability, and effective drugs against viral diseases shortly.
